hero.subtitle: Immersive Experience
hero.title: Real Self
hero.tagline: A transformative journey where anonymity reveals authenticity

experience.title: The Experience
experience.subtitle: 90 minutes of transformation
experience.intro: Real Self is an immersive theatrical experience that has captivated audiences in Buenos Aires, Barcelona, and Santiago. Participants wear identical white overalls, gloves, and masks, creating complete anonymity that liberates authentic human connection. We're excited to bring this transformative experience to China and expand into new territories.

quote.text: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken."
quote.author: Oscar Wilde

duration.title: Duration
duration.desc: 90 minutes total (60 min experience + 30 min transition)

arrival.title: Arrival & Preparation
arrival.desc: Guests store belongings in private lockers and receive their white costume

transformation.title: Transformation
transformation.desc: Participants dress in identical overalls, gloves, and masks

experience.title: The Experience
experience.desc: Guided through immersive projections and interactive moments

revelation.title: Revelation
revelation.desc: The journey concludes with a powerful collective moment

return.title: Return
return.desc: Participants change and collect their belongings

venue.title: Venue Space
venue.desc: Minimum 180m² for 150 participants, up to 420m² for 350 participants. Open floor plan preferred.

ceiling.title: Ceiling Height
ceiling.desc: Minimum 5 meters for floor projection. Projectors mounted on ceiling with full floor coverage.

environment.title: Environment
environment.desc: Complete light control, professional sound system, climate control for participant comfort.

cta.title: Ready to Explore the Possibilities?
cta.subtitle: Discover our venue scenarios and financial projections

scenarios.title: Venue Scenarios
scenarios.subtitle: Investment overview for three venue configurations
scenarios.intro: Each scenario represents a different venue capacity, with corresponding investment requirements and projected returns. All figures based on standard operating assumptions.

scale.title: Multi-Location Potential
scale.subtitle: Partner annual profit projections based on medium venue (250 capacity) across multiple Tier 1 cities.

direction.name: Production & Direction
direction.detail: 3 months - Remote & on-site direction, China adaptation oversight

projection.name: Projection Mapping Design
projection.detail: Custom venue mapping and content adaptation

insurance.name: Setup Insurance
insurance.detail: Coverage for setup crew during installation

partnership.title: Partnership Model
partnership.subtitle: A proven structure for mutual success

technical.title: Technical Setup
technical.desc: On-site installation, projector mapping, audio calibration, and system integration by our technical team.

training.title: Staff Training
training.desc: Comprehensive training program for guides, technicians, and management to ensure authentic experience delivery.

creative.title: Creative Content
creative.desc: Full projection content, audio design, and narrative adapted for Chinese audience with cultural consultation.

qa.title: Quality Assurance
qa.desc: Regular visits by our creative team to ensure experience quality and provide ongoing refinements.

brand.title: Brand Assets
brand.desc: Full marketing toolkit including logos, photography, video assets, and brand guidelines for local campaigns.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.desc: Direct communication channel for troubleshooting, updates, and expansion planning support.

relocation.title: Location Flexibility
relocation.desc1: The entire experience can be relocated to a new venue in just two weeks, including full teardown and reinstallation.
relocation.desc2: Our team handles the complete migration process, allowing partners to move between venues, test new markets, or expand to additional locations with minimal downtime.

thankyou.title: Thank You for Your Interest
thankyou.message: We're excited about the possibility of bringing Real Self to China. Our team is ready to discuss how we can create an unforgettable experience together.
thankyou.contact: For inquiries, please reach out to discuss partnership opportunities.

footer.copyright: Real Self Experience. All rights reserved.
